title: Jangle Question
body:
How do you play as a jungler when one or more of your lanes gets completely smashed and loses their tower early?

Bringing this up because earlier today my bot lane lost their turret around 7 minutes and the enemy bot started roaming into my jungle and pushing down our turrets. I always end up shutting down when I lose pace of the game like that because it ruins my tempo, and I just try to farm/ward and try to pick off people mid rotation or just tilt into another dimension. So I was wondering if there was anything else that should be done or can be done when the enemy team gets a snowball like that going.
